channel.title: I can chop down maple tree with lvl 1 wc?..HELP

item.title: I can chop down maple tree with lvl 1 wc?..HELP
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

I want to make it so that you only can chop down maple trees with 50 or higher woodcutting so what would the code be?..
This one I use:::

case 1307: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1500 * playerLevel[8]), 8); addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("You Gain Some woodcutting, and get some Cash!"); setAnimation(875); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Hope u guys can help me!

Read full topic
